SENT.plain: A 22-year-old woman with a diagnosis of Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome presented with pain in the left hypochondrium and vomiting
Investigations revealed a huge splenomegaly with multiple hypodense lesions and irregular, linearly enhanced areas
She underwent splenectomy and had good postoperative recovery
Histopathology showed hemangioma/lymphangioma of the spleen
